Start Blogging

  • Jekyll Quick Start

    Quickly get your blog installed and published via GitHub Pages. Then run your blog locally and create your first post and page.

  • Using Themes

    Learn how to install, switch between, and edit themes in Jekyll Bootstrap.

  • Blog Configuration

    Learn how to configure URL formats, and add comments and analytics.

  • Deployment & Hosting

    Jekyll Bootstrap is built to deploy instantly to GitHub Pages. However you can also deploy to your own server as well as Amazon S3.
